config.label: URL
config.helperText: The Slack Webhook URL to call. Needs to be a fully qualified URL or property containing URL.

config.label: Channel
config.helperText: The name of the channel or user as a destination for the messages

config.label: Icon
config.helperText: The emoji to set as the icon

config.label: Username
config.helperText: Larger, bold text near the top of a message

config.label: Message
config.helperText: The text to appear above the file and also in the fallback.

config.label: File Content
config.helperText: The flow property or text containing the file content.

config.label: Decode File Content
config.helperText: Decode the file content from base64. This is useful if an encoded Flow output property is used as the file content.

config.label: Context
config.helperText: Provide a message context at the base of the response.

description: Send slack message and contents of file
name: Send Slack Message with File Contents
